dmca.title: RE: QVCSITE.COM - Domain Name Infringement
dmca.body:
Dear Mr. Kauppinen:

I have your September 21, 2006 response to my September 20, 2006 letter
in which I informed you that my client would take appropriate action if
you refuse to transfer to it the infringing domain name, qvcsite.com.

My client will not "buy" this domain name from you. If you refuse to
transfer the domain name we will proceed with an action to compel you 
to
transfer the domain name. However, if you are willing to transfer the
domain name, my client will reimburse you for the reasonable costs
incurred in registering the domain name, not to exceed $100. If you 
wish
to proceed by transferring the domain name, you must notify me by
Monday, October 2, 2006. If I do not hear from you by then, we shall
proceed with an action against you.

Very truly yours,

Stanley C. Macel III
Connolly Bove Lodge & Hutz
P.O. Box 2207
1007 North Orange Street
Wilmington, DE 19899
Tele 302 888 6260
